info.name: Property Tycoon
info.attribution:
Room layout and design by LawDawg. Released to the public domain under CC0.

The coin icon is available under the Pixabay license at https://pixabay.com/vectors/coin-money-penny-1873955/.

Other icons are from https://game-icons.net/ and available under CC BY 3.0:     Delapouite: piggy bank, https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/piggy-bank.html
    lorc: gavel, https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/gavel.html

The properties were generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using a prompt that generally described what the property was plus: "anime drawing --ar 5:8".

The room background was generated using MidJourney with the prompt "anime drawing of suburban neighborhood --ar 16:10".

The house icon was generated using Midjourney with the prompt "house [or gold coin] icon anime sprite sheet".
info.description: Bid for properties at auction and then sell them for the most profit.
info.similarAwards:
2017 Hungarian Board Game Award Nominee
2016 Lys Grand Public Finalist
info.helpText:
Sit in seats. Press restart button to begin. A random player is chosen to start.  The appropriate number of cards are removed from the board. Property cards are dealt automatically.

Press the + and - buttons near your seat to bid.  Press the skip/next button to move the turn indicator.  If you pass, press the gavel to end the auction for you. The lowest value property card remaining for auction is moved to your hand. One-half (rounded down) of the coins are returned to you and the rest are moved to the bank.

If you are the last player to take a card, press the gavel. All of the coins are moved to the bank and another set of property cards for auction are dealt.

After the property auction, the currency value cards are put up for display. Each player moves one property card to the holder above the seat. All players flip them over at the same time. The player with the highest value property card takes the highest value currency card into their hand. Continue this until that round of currency cards is claimed.

After each player has taken their card, more currency cards are dealt. After all currency cards have been claimed, press the scoreboard button to add up the total of currency cards and coins for each player. The final total is displayed in the red bid area. Highest score wins.

fields.text: You are about to reset the game. Are you sure?

thenRoutine: // Makes visual changes needed for next phase. Moves money cards if there are none in the holder

fields.text: This will end the auction for you and will transfer coins and cards. Are you sure?
This will calculate and display the points for all players. Are you sure?
